doctor_notes.subjective: Patient reports feeling dizzy and lightheaded.
doctor_notes.plan: Increase fluid intake and monitor blood pressure.
doctor_notes.other: Patient advised to rest and avoid sudden movements.

doctor_notes.plan: Prescribe analgesics and recommend relaxation techniques.
doctor_notes.intervention: Provided medication and scheduled follow-up appointment.
doctor_notes.other: Patient advised to maintain a headache diary.

doctor_notes.subjective: Patient feels fatigued and has difficulty sleeping.
doctor_notes.objective: Blood tests are within normal range.
doctor_notes.plan: Refer to a mental health specialist.
doctor_notes.other: Advised patient to engage in regular physical activity.

doctor_notes.subjective: Patient is preparing for upcoming surgery.
